ref: 12661 śmāśāniká ʻ frequenting cremation grounds ʼ Pāṇ. com., śmaśānika -- Car. [śmaśāná -- ]
Or. masāṇiā ʻ frequenting cremation grounds (e.g. of a goblin), term of abuse ʼ;
H. masānī f. ʻ one of the seven goddesses of smallpox ʼ, masāniyā m. ʻ one who removes the remains of a burnt corpse or the influence of an evil spirit, graveyard ghost ʼ (→
P. masānī, ˚nīā m. ʻ one who removes the remains of a burnt corpse ʼ);
G. masāṇī m. ʻ one who officiates at burning or burying the dead ʼ, adj. ʻ wretched ʼ.
